message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's better to settle now than lose value due to inflation!
Alice, your offer was a bit too lopsided. Let's be more equitable this round. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?

Bob, it's clear we're both trying to maximize our gains, but this back and forth isn't helping. Let's end this fairly with a 50/50 split.  I'm losing money with every round, and another rejection will only hurt us both.
